### **About**\
\
I am a PhD candidate at Brigham Young University in the [Biology Department](https://biology.byu.edu/). My area of emphasis is [Bioinformatics](https://biology.byu.edu/bioinformatics). I am currently working on a [computational pipeline](https://github.com/dmiller903/GMKF_CH_pipeline) for the analysis of *Compound Heterozygous* variants in pediatric cancers and structural birth defects.
